commands.name: generate-password-and-write
commands.title: Generate Password and Write
commands.description: Generates a 24-character alphanumeric password and writes it

commands.name: generate-password-and-copy
commands.title: Generate Password and Copy
commands.description: Generates a 24-character alphanumeric password and copies it to the clipboard.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
